description: Recipient of the CBYX/PPP Scholarship which afforded the opportunity to experience a full academic year abroad in Germany. The CBYX program is a political scholarship program established by both the The United States of America and Germany. The bases of the program is to send exchange students abroad for an academic year as student representatives. Each scholarship winner is sponsored by their state representative in Congress. Directly helping to strengthen and enhance ties between The United States of America and Germany through the work of young ambassadors.
